content: this summery crochet cardigan is perfect when you want a light layer of warmth and style featuring an openwork design in bernat softee cotton it s cool and comfy for the warmer seasons this oversized cardigan features a bold lace motif and carefree fringe to match your summertime mood featuring single_crochet the pattern includes both written and charted instructions for more visual learners this pattern coordinates with the festival bralette pattern https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/festival-bralette-2
